entry.def: A hamstring is a length of tissue or tendon behind your knee which joins the muscles of your thigh to the bones of your lower leg.

example.ex: Webster has not played since suffering a hamstring injury in the opening game.
example.tran: 韦伯斯特自从在首场比赛中伤了绳肌腱后就再也没有参赛了。

entry.tran: 使无能为力;使陷入瘫痪
entry.def: If you hamstring someone, you make it very difficult for them to take any action.

example.ex: If he becomes the major opposition leader, he could hamstring a conservative-led coalition.
example.tran: 如果他成为主要反对党的领袖，可能会导致保守党领导的联合政府陷于瘫痪。
